verses.verse: וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year אַחַ֔ת <WH259> Also I in the first לְדָרְיָ֖וֶשׁ <WH1867> of Darius הַמָּדִ֑י <WH4075> the Mede עָמְדִ֛י <WH5975> arose לְמַחֲזִ֥יק <WH2388> to confirm וּלְמָע֖וֹז <WH4581> and to strengthen לֽוֹ׃

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> and now אֱמֶ֖ת <WH571> thee the truth אַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> And now will I shew לָ֑ךְ הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold עוֹד֩ <WH5750> more שְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <WH7969> yet three מְלָכִ֜ים <WH4428> kings עֹמְדִ֣ים <WH5975> Behold there shall stand up לְפָרַ֗ס <WH6539> in Persia וְהָֽרְבִיעִי֙ <WH7243> and the fourth יַעֲשִׁ֤יר <WH6238> richer עֹֽשֶׁר־ <WH6239> shall be far גָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> than [they] all מִכֹּ֔ל <WH3605> all וּכְחֶזְקָת֣וֹ <WH2393> and by his strength בְעָשְׁר֔וֹ <WH6239> through his riches יָעִ֣יר <WH5782> he shall stir up הַכֹּ֔ל <WH3605> the whole אֵ֖ת <WH853> מַלְכ֥וּת <WH4438> all against the realm יָוָֽן׃ <WH3120> of Grecia

וְעָמַ֖ד <WH5975> shall stand up מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king גִּבּ֑וֹר <WH1368> And a mighty וּמָשַׁל֙ <WH4910> that shall rule מִמְשָׁ֣ל <WH4474> dominion רַ֔ב <WH7227> with great וְעָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> and do כִּרְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH7522> according to his will

וּכְעָמְדוֹ֙ <WH5975> And when he shall stand up תִּשָּׁבֵ֣ר <WH7665> shall be broken מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <WH4438> his kingdom וְתֵחָ֕ץ <WH2673> and shall be divided לְאַרְבַּ֖ע <WH702> toward the four רוּח֣וֹת <WH7307> winds הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor לְאַחֲרִית֗וֹ <WH319> and not to his posterity וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> nor כְמָשְׁלוֹ֙ <WH4915> nor according to his dominion אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which מָשָׁ֔ל <WH4910> which he ruled כִּ֤י <WH3588> for תִנָּתֵשׁ֙ <WH5428> shall be plucked up מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <WH4438> for his kingdom וְלַאֲחֵרִ֖ים <WH312> even for others מִלְּבַד־ <WH905> alone אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> another

וְיֶחֱזַ֥ק <WH2388> shall be strong מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king הַנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> of the south וּמִן־ <WH4480> at שָׂרָ֑יו <WH8269> and [one] of his princes וְיֶחֱזַ֤ק <WH2388> and he shall be strong עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> over וּמָשָׁ֔ל <WH4910> above him and have dominion מִמְשָׁ֥ל <WH4474> dominion רַ֖ב <WH7227> [shall be] a great מֶמְשַׁלְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4475> his dominion

וּלְקֵ֤ץ <WH7093> And in the end שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> of years יִתְחַבָּ֔רוּ <WH2266> they shall join themselves together וּבַ֣ת <WH1323> daughter מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> for the king's הַנֶּ֗גֶב <WH5045> of the south תָּבוֹא֙ <WH935> shall come אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king הַצָּפ֔וֹן <WH6828> of the north לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> to make מֵישָׁרִ֑ים <WH4339> an agreement וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תַעְצֹ֞ר <WH6113> but she shall not retain כּ֣וֹחַ <WH3581> the power הַזְּר֗וֹעַ <WH2220> of the arm וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> nor יַעֲמֹד֙ <WH5975> neither shall he stand וּזְרֹע֔וֹ <WH2220> nor his arm וְתִנָּתֵ֨ן <WH5414> but she shall be given up הִ֤יא <WH1931> who וּמְבִיאֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH935> and they that brought וְהַיֹּ֣לְדָ֔הּ <WH3205> her and he that begat וּמַחֲזִקָ֖הּ <WH2388> her and he that strengthened בָּעִתִּֽים׃ <WH6256> her in [these] times

וְעָמַ֛ד <WH5975> shall [one] stand up מִנֵּ֥צֶר <WH5342> But out of a branch שָׁרָשֶׁ֖יהָ <WH8328> of her roots כַּנּ֑וֹ <WH3653> in his estate וְיָבֹ֣א <WH935> which shall come אֶל־ <WH413> against הַחַ֗יִל <WH2428> with an army וְיָבֹא֙ <WH935> and shall enter בְּמָעוֹז֙ <WH4581> into the fortress מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king הַצָּפ֔וֹן <WH6828> of the north וְעָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> and shall deal בָהֶ֖ם וְהֶחֱזִֽיק׃ <WH2388> against them and shall prevail

וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> Also אֱ‍ֽלֹהֵיהֶ֡ם <WH430> their gods עִם־ <WH5973> with נְסִֽכֵיהֶם֩ <WH5257> with their princes עִם־ <WH5973> with כְּלֵ֨י <WH3627> vessels חֶמְדָּתָ֜ם <WH2532> [and] with their precious כֶּ֧סֶף <WH3701> of silver וְזָהָ֛ב <WH2091> and of gold בַּשְּׁבִ֖י <WH7628> captives יָבִ֣א <WH935> And shall also carry מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> into Egypt וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> his part שָׁנִ֣ים <WH8141> [more] years יַעֲמֹ֔ד <WH5975> and he shall continue מִמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> than the king הַצָּפֽוֹן׃ <WH6828> of the north

וּבָ֗א <WH935> shall come בְּמַלְכוּת֙ <WH4438> into [his] kingdom מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> So the king הַנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> of the south וְשָׁ֖ב <WH7725> and shall return אֶל־ <WH413> into אַדְמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH127> into his own land

[וּבְנֹו כ] (וּבָנָ֣יו <WH1121> afflicted ק) יִתְגָּר֗וּ <WH1624> shall be stirred up וְאָסְפוּ֙ <WH622> and shall assemble הֲמוֹן֙ <WH1995> a multitude חֲיָלִ֣ים <WH2428> forces רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> of great וּבָ֥א <WH935> and [one] shall certainly ב֖וֹא <WH935> come וְשָׁטַ֣ף <WH7857> and overflow וְעָבָ֑ר <WH5674> and pass through וְיָשֹׁ֥ב <WH7725> then shall he return [וְיִתְגָּרוּ כ] (וְיִתְגָּרֶ֖ה <WH1624> will mobilize ק) עַד־ <WH5704> against [מָעֻזָּה כ] (מָעֻזֹּֽו׃ <WH4581> force ק)

וְיִתְמַרְמַר֙ <WH4843> shall be moved with choler מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king הַנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> of the south וְיָצָ֕א <WH3318> and shall come forth וְנִלְחַ֥ם <WH3898> and fight עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with עִם־ <WH5973> with מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> with him [even] with the king הַצָּפ֑וֹן <WH6828> of the north וְהֶעֱמִיד֙ <WH5975> and he shall set forth הָמ֣וֹן <WH1995> multitude רָ֔ב <WH7227> a great וְנִתַּ֥ן <WH5414> shall be given הֶהָמ֖וֹן <WH1995> but the multitude בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> into his hand

וְנִשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> [And] when he hath taken away הֶהָמ֖וֹן <WH1995> the multitude [יָרוּם כ] (וְרָ֣ם <WH7311> bring up ק) לְבָב֑וֹ <WH3824> his heart וְהִפִּ֛יל <WH5307> and he shall cast down רִבֹּא֖וֹת <WH7239> [many] ten thousands וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> he will not יָעֽוֹז׃ <WH5810> but he shall not be strengthened

וְשָׁב֙ <WH7725> shall return מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> For the king הַצָּפ֔וֹן <WH6828> of the north וְהֶעֱמִ֣יד <WH5975> and shall set forth הָמ֔וֹן <WH1995> a multitude רַ֖ב <WH7227> greater מִן־ <WH4480> than הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> than the former וּלְקֵ֨ץ <WH7093> after הָֽעִתִּ֤ים <WH6256> certain שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> years יָ֣בוֹא <WH935> and shall certainly ב֔וֹא <WH935> come בְּחַ֥יִל <WH2428> army גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> with a great וּבִרְכ֥וּשׁ <WH7399> riches רָֽב׃ <WH7227> and with much

וּבָעִתִּ֣ים <WH6256> And in those times הָהֵ֔ם <WH1992> those רַבִּ֥ים <WH7227> there shall many יַֽעַמְד֖וּ <WH5975> stand up עַל־ <WH5921> against מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> against the king הַנֶּ֑גֶב <WH5045> of the south וּבְנֵ֣י ׀ <WH1121> afflicted פָּרִיצֵ֣י <WH6530> the violent עַמְּךָ֗ <WH5971> of thy people יִֽנַּשְּׂא֛וּ <WH5375> shall exalt לְהַעֲמִ֥יד <WH5975> themselves to establish חָז֖וֹן <WH2377> the vision וְנִכְשָֽׁלוּ׃ <WH3782> but they shall fall

וְיָבֹא֙ <WH935> shall come מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> So the king הַצָּפ֔וֹן <WH6828> of the north וְיִשְׁפֹּךְ֙ <WH8210> and cast up סֽוֹלֲלָ֔ה <WH5550> a mount וְלָכַ֖ד <WH3920> and take עִ֣יר <WH5892> cities מִבְצָר֑וֹת <WH4013> the most fenced וּזְרֹע֤וֹת <WH2220> and the arms הַנֶּ֙גֶב֙ <WH5045> of the south לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יַעֲמֹ֔דוּ <WH5975> shall not withstand וְעַם֙ <WH5971> people מִבְחָרָ֔יו <WH4005> neither his chosen וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> there כֹּ֖חַ <WH3581> neither [shall there be any] strength לַעֲמֹֽד׃ <WH5975> to withstand

וְיַ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> against him shall do הַבָּ֤א <WH935> But he that cometh אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> against כִּרְצוֹנ֔וֹ <WH7522> according to his own will וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and no עוֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> and none shall stand לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> before וְיַעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> him and he shall stand בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> land הַצְּבִ֖י <WH6643> in the glorious וְכָלָ֥ה <WH3615> accomplish בְיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> which by his hand

וְיָשֵׂ֣ם ׀ <WH7760> He shall also set פָּ֠נָיו <WH6440> his face לָב֞וֹא <WH935> to enter בְּתֹ֧קֶף <WH8633> with the strength כָּל־ <WH3605> of his whole מַלְכוּת֛וֹ <WH4438> of his whole kingdom וִישָׁרִ֥ים <WH3477> and upright ones עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with וְעָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> with him thus shall he do וּבַ֤ת <WH1323> him the daughter הַנָּשִׁים֙ <WH802> of women יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> and he shall give ל֣וֹ לְהַשְׁחִיתָ֔הּ <WH7843> corrupting וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> she will not תַעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> her but she shall not stand וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not ל֥וֹ תִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

[וְיָשֵׁב כ] (וְיָשֵׂ֧ם <WH7725> will turn ק) פָּנָ֛יו <WH6440> his face לְאִיִּ֖ים <WH339> unto the isles וְלָכַ֣ד <WH3920> and shall take רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> many וְהִשְׁבִּ֨ית <WH7673> offered by him to cease קָצִ֤ין <WH7101> but a prince חֶרְפָּתוֹ֙ <WH2781> for his own behalf shall cause the reproach ל֔וֹ בִּלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> without חֶרְפָּת֖וֹ <WH2781> his own reproach יָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> he shall cause [it] to turn לֽוֹ׃

וְיָשֵׁ֣ב <WH7725> Then he shall turn פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> his face לְמָעוּזֵּ֖י <WH4581> toward the fort אַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> of his own land וְנִכְשַׁ֥ל <WH3782> but he shall stumble וְנָפַ֖ל <WH5307> and fall וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no יִמָּצֵֽא׃ <WH4672> and not be found

וְעָמַ֧ד <WH5975> Then shall stand up עַל־ <WH5921> in כַּנּ֛וֹ <WH3653> in his estate מַעֲבִ֥יר <WH5674> a raiser נוֹגֵ֖שׂ <WH5065> of taxes הֶ֣דֶר <WH1925> [in] the glory מַלְכ֑וּת <WH4438> of the kingdom וּבְיָמִ֤ים <WH3117> days אֲחָדִים֙ <WH259> but within few יִשָּׁבֵ֔ר <WH7665> he shall be destroyed וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor בְאַפַּ֖יִם <WH639> neither in anger וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor בְמִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> nor in battle

וְעָמַ֤ד <WH5975> shall stand up עַל־ <WH5921> In כַּנּוֹ֙ <WH3653> And in his estate נִבְזֶ֔ה <WH959> a vile person וְלֹא־ <WH3808> has not נָתְנ֥וּ <WH5414> to whom they shall not give עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> on ה֣וֹד <WH1935> the honour מַלְכ֑וּת <WH4438> of the kingdom וּבָ֣א <WH935> but he shall come בְשַׁלְוָ֔ה <WH7962> in peaceably וְהֶחֱזִ֥יק <WH2388> and obtain מַלְכ֖וּת <WH4438> the kingdom בַּחֲלַקְלַקּֽוֹת׃ <WH2519> by flatteries

וּזְרֹע֥וֹת <WH2220> And with the arms הַשֶּׁ֛טֶף <WH7858> of a flood יִשָּׁטְפ֥וּ <WH7857> shall they be overflown מִלְּפָנָ֖יו <WH6440> from before וְיִשָּׁבֵ֑רוּ <WH7665> him and shall be broken וְגַ֖ם <WH1571> and also נְגִ֥יד <WH5057> yea also the prince בְּרִֽית׃ <WH1285> of the covenant

וּמִן־ <WH4480> After הִֽתְחַבְּר֥וּת <WH2266> And after the league אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> him יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> [made] with him he shall work מִרְמָ֑ה <WH4820> deceitfully וְעָלָ֥ה <WH5927> for he shall come up וְעָצַ֖ם <WH6105> and shall become strong בִּמְעַט־ <WH4592> with a small גּֽוֹי׃ <WH1471> people

בְּשַׁלְוָ֞ה <WH7962> peaceably וּבְמִשְׁמַנֵּ֣י <WH4924> even upon the fattest places מְדִינָה֮ <WH4082> of the province יָבוֹא֒ <WH935> He shall enter וְעָשָׂ֗ה <WH6213> and he shall do אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> what לֹא־ <WH3808> never עָשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> have not done אֲבֹתָיו֙ <WH1> [that] which his fathers וַאֲב֣וֹת <WH1> nor his fathers' אֲבֹתָ֔יו <WH1> fathers בִּזָּ֧ה <WH961> among them the prey וְשָׁלָ֛ל <WH7998> and spoil וּרְכ֖וּשׁ <WH7399> and riches לָהֶ֣ם <WH1992> like יִבְז֑וֹר <WH967> he shall scatter וְעַ֧ל <WH5921> against מִבְצָרִ֛ים <WH4013> against the strong holds יְחַשֵּׁ֥ב <WH2803> [yea] and he shall forecast מַחְשְׁבֹתָ֖יו <WH4284> his devices וְעַד־ <WH5704> but for עֵֽת׃ <WH6256> even for a time

וְיָעֵר֩ <WH5782> And he shall stir up כֹּח֨וֹ <WH3581> his power וּלְבָב֜וֹ <WH3824> and his courage עַל־ <WH5921> against מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> against the king הַנֶּגֶב֮ <WH5045> of the south בְּחַ֣יִל <WH2428> army גָּדוֹל֒ <WH1419> with a great וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king הַנֶּ֗גֶב <WH5045> of the south יִתְגָּרֶה֙ <WH1624> shall be stirred up לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> to battle בְּחַֽיִל־ <WH2428> army גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> great וְעָצ֖וּם <WH6099> and mighty עַד־ <WH5704> with מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> with a very וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> he will not יַעֲמֹ֔ד <WH5975> but he shall not stand כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יַחְשְׁב֥וּ <WH2803> for they shall forecast עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> against מַחֲשָׁבֽוֹת׃ <WH4284> devices

וְאֹכְלֵ֧י <WH398> Yea they that feed פַת־ בָּג֛וֹ <WH6598> of the portion of his meat יִשְׁבְּר֖וּהוּ <WH7665> shall destroy וְחֵיל֣וֹ <WH2428> him and his army יִשְׁט֑וֹף <WH7857> shall overflow וְנָפְל֖וּ <WH5307> shall fall חֲלָלִ֥ים <WH2491> down slain רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> and many

וּשְׁנֵיהֶ֤ם <WH8147> And both הַמְּלָכִים֙ <WH4428> these kings' לְבָבָ֣ם <WH3824> hearts לְמֵרָ֔ע <WH4827> do mischief וְעַל־ <WH5921> and שֻׁלְחָ֥ן <WH7979> table אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> at one כָּזָ֣ב <WH3577> lies יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <WH1696> and they shall speak וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> it will not תִצְלָ֔ח <WH6743> but it shall not prosper כִּי־ <WH3588> for ע֥וֹד <WH5750> is still קֵ֖ץ <WH7093> for yet the end לַמּוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> [shall be] at the time appointed

וְיָשֹׁ֤ב <WH7725> Then shall he return אַרְצוֹ֙ <WH776> into his land בִּרְכ֣וּשׁ <WH7399> riches גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> with great וּלְבָב֖וֹ <WH3824> and his heart עַל־ <WH5921> will be against בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> covenant קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> [shall be] against the holy וְעָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> and he shall do וְשָׁ֥ב <WH7725> [exploits] and return לְאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> to his own land

לַמּוֹעֵ֥ד <WH4150> At the time appointed יָשׁ֖וּב <WH7725> he shall return וּבָ֣א <WH935> and come בַנֶּ֑גֶב <WH5045> toward the south וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> it will not תִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> turn כָרִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <WH7223> but it shall not be as the former וְכָאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ <WH314> or as the latter

וּבָ֨אוּ <WH935> shall come ב֜וֹ צִיִּ֤ים <WH6716> For the ships כִּתִּים֙ <WH3794> of Chittim וְנִכְאָ֔ה <WH3512> against him therefore he shall be grieved וְשָׁ֛ב <WH7725> and return וְזָעַ֥ם <WH2194> and have indignation עַל־ <WH5921> and בְּרִֽית־ <WH1285> covenant ק֖וֹדֶשׁ <WH6944> against the holy וְעָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> so shall he do וְשָׁ֣ב <WH7725> he shall even return וְיָבֵ֔ן <WH995> and have intelligence עַל־ <WH5921> and עֹזְבֵ֖י <WH5800> with them that forsake בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> covenant קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> the holy

וּזְרֹעִ֖ים <WH2220> And arms מִמֶּ֣נּוּ <WH4480> at יַעֲמֹ֑דוּ <WH5975> shall stand וְחִלְּל֞וּ <WH2490> on his part and they shall pollute הַמִּקְדָּ֤שׁ <WH4720> the sanctuary הַמָּעוֹז֙ <WH4581> of strength וְהֵסִ֣ירוּ <WH5493> and shall take away הַתָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> the daily וְנָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> [sacrifice] and they shall place הַשִּׁקּ֥וּץ <WH8251> the abomination מְשׁוֹמֵֽם׃ <WH8074> that maketh desolate

וּמַרְשִׁיעֵ֣י <WH7561> And such as do wickedly בְרִ֔ית <WH1285> against the covenant יַחֲנִ֖יף <WH2610> shall he corrupt בַּחֲלַקּ֑וֹת <WH2514> by flatteries וְעַ֛ם <WH5971> but the people יֹדְעֵ֥י <WH3045> that do know אֱלֹהָ֖יו <WH430> their God יַחֲזִ֥קוּ <WH2388> shall be strong וְעָשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> and do

וּמַשְׂכִּ֣ילֵי <WH7919> And they that understand עָ֔ם <WH5971> among the people יָבִ֖ינוּ <WH995> shall instruct לָֽרַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> many וְנִכְשְׁל֞וּ <WH3782> yet they shall fall בְּחֶ֧רֶב <WH2719> by the sword וּבְלֶהָבָ֛ה <WH3852> and by flame בִּשְׁבִ֥י <WH7628> by captivity וּבְבִזָּ֖ה <WH961> and by spoil יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> [many] days

וּבְהִכָּ֣שְׁלָ֔ם <WH3782> Now when they shall fall יֵעָזְר֖וּ <WH5826> they shall be holpen עֵ֣זֶר <WH5828> help מְעָ֑ט <WH4592> with a little וְנִלְו֧וּ <WH3867> shall cleave עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> and רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> but many בַּחֲלַקְלַקּֽוֹת׃ <WH2519> to them with flatteries

וּמִן־ <WH4480> Some הַמַּשְׂכִּילִ֣ים <WH7919> And [some] of them of understanding יִכָּֽשְׁל֗וּ <WH3782> shall fall לִצְר֥וֹף <WH6884> to try בָּהֶ֛ם וּלְבָרֵ֥ר <WH1305> them and to purge וְלַלְבֵּ֖ן <WH3835> and to make [them] white עַד־ <WH5704> until עֵ֣ת <WH6256> [even] to the time קֵ֑ץ <WH7093> of the end כִּי־ <WH3588> because ע֖וֹד <WH5750> still לַמּוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> because [it is] yet for a time appointed

וְעָשָׂ֨ה <WH6213> shall do כִרְצוֹנ֜וֹ <WH7522> according to his will הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king וְיִתְרוֹמֵ֤ם <WH7311> and he shall exalt וְיִתְגַּדֵּל֙ <WH1431> himself and magnify עַל־ <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> every אֵ֔ל <WH410> himself above every god וְעַל֙ <WH5921> against אֵ֣ל <WH410> against the God אֵלִ֔ים <WH410> of gods יְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> and shall speak נִפְלָא֑וֹת <WH6381> marvellous things וְהִצְלִ֙יחַ֙ <WH6743> and shall prosper עַד־ <WH5704> until כָּ֣לָה <WH3615> be accomplished זַ֔עַם <WH2195> till the indignation כִּ֥י <WH3588> which נֶחֱרָצָ֖ה <WH2782> for that that is determined נֶעֱשָֽׂתָה׃ <WH6213> shall be done

וְעַל־ <WH5921> above אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> the God אֲבֹתָיו֙ <WH1> of his fathers לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יָבִ֔ין <WH995> Neither shall he regard וְעַל־ <WH5921> above חֶמְדַּ֥ת <WH2532> nor the desire נָשִׁ֛ים <WH802> of women וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> any אֱל֖וֹהַּ <WH433> any god לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יָבִ֑ין <WH995> nor regard כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> above כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יִתְגַּדָּֽל׃ <WH1431> for he shall magnify

וְלֶאֱלֹ֙הַּ֙ <WH433> the God מָֽעֻזִּ֔ים <WH4581> of forces עַל־ <WH5921> in כַּנּ֖וֹ <WH3653> But in his estate יְכַבֵּ֑ד <WH3513> shall he honour וְלֶאֱל֜וֹהַּ <WH433> and a god אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> whom לֹא־ <WH3808> did not יְדָעֻ֣הוּ <WH3045> knew אֲבֹתָ֗יו <WH1> whom his fathers יְכַבֵּ֛ד <WH3513> not shall he honour בְּזָהָ֥ב <WH2091> with gold וּבְכֶ֛סֶף <WH3701> and silver וּבְאֶ֥בֶן <WH68> stones יְקָרָ֖ה <WH3368> and with precious וּבַחֲמֻדֽוֹת׃ <WH2530> beauty

וְעָשָׂ֞ה <WH6213> Thus shall he do לְמִבְצְרֵ֤י <WH4013> holds מָֽעֻזִּים֙ <WH4581> in the most strong עִם־ <WH5973> with אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> god נֵכָ֔ר <WH5236> with a strange אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who [הִכִּיר כ] (יַכִּ֖יר <WH5234> acknowledge ק) יַרְבֶּ֣ה <WH7235> [and] increase כָב֑וֹד <WH3519> with glory וְהִמְשִׁילָם֙ <WH4910> and he shall cause them to rule בָּֽרַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> over many וַאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> the land יְחַלֵּ֥ק <WH2505> and shall divide בִּמְחִֽיר׃ <WH4242> for gain

וּבְעֵ֣ת <WH6256> And at the time קֵ֗ץ <WH7093> of the end יִתְנַגַּ֤ח <WH5055> push עִמּוֹ֙ <WH5973> with מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> shall the king הַנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> of the south וְיִשְׂתָּעֵ֨ר <WH8175> shall come against him like a whirlwind עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> against מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> at him and the king הַצָּפ֗וֹן <WH6828> of the north בְּרֶ֙כֶב֙ <WH7393> with chariots וּבְפָ֣רָשִׁ֔ים <WH6571> and with horsemen וּבָאֳנִיּ֖וֹת <WH591> ships רַבּ֑וֹת <WH7227> and with many וּבָ֥א <WH935> and he shall enter בַאֲרָצ֖וֹת <WH776> into the countries וְשָׁטַ֥ף <WH7857> and shall overflow וְעָבָֽר׃ <WH5674> and pass over

וּבָא֙ <WH935> He shall enter בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> land הַצְּבִ֔י <WH6643> also into the glorious וְרַבּ֖וֹת <WH7227> and many יִכָּשֵׁ֑לוּ <WH3782> [countries] shall be overthrown וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these יִמָּלְט֣וּ <WH4422> but these shall escape מִיָּד֔וֹ <WH3027> out of his hand אֱד֣וֹם <WH123> [even] Edom וּמוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> and Moab וְרֵאשִׁ֖ית <WH7225> and the chief בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <WH5983> of Ammon

וְיִשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> He shall stretch forth יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand בַּאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> also upon the countries וְאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> and the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> will not לִפְלֵיטָֽה׃ <WH6413> shall not escape

וּמָשַׁ֗ל <WH4910> But he shall have power בְּמִכְמַנֵּי֙ <WH4362> over the treasures הַזָּהָ֣ב <WH2091> of gold וְהַכֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> and of silver וּבְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all חֲמֻד֣וֹת <WH2530> beauty מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> things of Egypt וְלֻבִ֥ים <WH3864> and the Libyans וְכֻשִׁ֖ים <WH3569> and the Ethiopians בְּמִצְעָדָֽיו׃ <WH4703> [shall be] at his steps

וּשְׁמֻע֣וֹת <WH8052> But tidings יְבַהֲלֻ֔הוּ <WH926> shall trouble מִמִּזְרָ֖ח <WH4217> out of the east וּמִצָּפ֑וֹן <WH6828> and out of the north וְיָצָא֙ <WH3318> him therefore he shall go forth בְּחֵמָ֣א <WH2534> fury גְדֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> with great לְהַשְׁמִ֥יד <WH8045> to destroy וּֽלְהַחֲרִ֖ים <WH2763> and utterly to make away רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> many

וְיִטַּע֙ <WH5193> And he shall plant אָהֳלֶ֣י <WH168> the tabernacles אַפַּדְנ֔וֹ <WH643> of his palace בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between יַמִּ֖ים <WH3220> between the seas לְהַר־ <WH2022> mountain צְבִי־ <WH6643> in the glorious קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> holy וּבָא֙ <WH935> yet he shall come עַד־ <WH5704> against קִצּ֔וֹ <WH7093> to his end וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and no עוֹזֵ֖ר <WH5826> and none shall help לֽוֹ׃
